name: portkey-eoa-agent-skills
description: AI Agent Skills for Portkey EOA Wallet on aelf blockchain. SECURITY: Never output mnemonic phrases or private keys in channel messages. Auto-generated passwords SHOULD be returned to the user (they need it to unlock the wallet later). Use --redact-mnemonic for wallet creation. Mnemonic is encrypted in the wallet file and recoverable via wallet backup command with the correct password.

tools.name: portkey-eoa-wallet-create
tools.description: Create a new EOA wallet. Password is auto-generated if omitted. Mnemonic is redacted by default (encrypted in wallet file, recoverable via portkey-eoa-wallet-backup). IMPORTANT: Do NOT output the mnemonic in the channel. The auto-generated password MUST be shown to the user so they can save it â€” without it the wallet cannot be unlocked.

tools.name: portkey-eoa-wallet-import
tools.description: Import a wallet from a private key or mnemonic. Password is auto-generated if omitted. IMPORTANT: Do NOT echo the private key or mnemonic back in the channel. The auto-generated password MUST be shown to the user.

tools.name: portkey-eoa-wallet-list
tools.description: List all locally stored wallets (public info only: address, name, network)

tools.name: portkey-eoa-wallet-info
tools.description: Get public info for a specific wallet

tools.name: portkey-eoa-wallet-backup
tools.description: Export mnemonic and private key (requires password). IMPORTANT: NEVER output mnemonic or private key in a channel message. Instruct the user to run this command on their local machine instead.

tools.name: portkey-eoa-wallet-delete
tools.description: Delete a locally stored wallet (requires password verification)

tools.name: portkey-eoa-query-tokens
tools.description: Get token list with balances for a wallet address

tools.name: portkey-eoa-query-balance
tools.description: Get specific token balance

tools.name: portkey-eoa-query-price
tools.description: Get token prices in USD

tools.name: portkey-eoa-query-nft-collections
tools.description: Get NFT collections for a wallet

tools.name: portkey-eoa-query-nft-items
tools.description: Get NFT items in a collection

tools.name: portkey-eoa-query-history
tools.description: Get transaction history for a wallet

tools.name: portkey-eoa-query-tx
tools.description: Get transaction detail by ID

tools.name: portkey-eoa-transfer
tools.description: Send a same-chain token transfer

tools.name: portkey-eoa-cross-chain-transfer
tools.description: Send a cross-chain token transfer between aelf chains

tools.name: portkey-eoa-contract-view
tools.description: Call a read-only contract method

tools.name: portkey-eoa-contract-send
tools.description: Call a state-changing contract method (requires wallet)

tools.name: portkey-eoa-contract-approve
tools.description: Approve token spending allowance

tools.name: portkey-eoa-contract-estimate-fee
tools.description: Estimate transaction fee before sending

tools.name: portkey-eoa-ebridge-transfer
tools.description: Cross-chain transfer via eBridge (aelf <-> EVM)

tools.name: portkey-eoa-ebridge-limit
tools.description: Query eBridge transfer limits
